name: @natehennings
body: @manpacks is awesome. Between @manpacks, @zappos, and @soap.com, I might never have to run errands again.

name: @alexknowshtml
body: Maybe it's silly, but @manpacks is my FAVORITE SAAS service that I pay for. Socks as a service, amirite?

name: @conanobrien
body: My wife usually does my shopping for me, but with @manpacks I can take care of myself.
